website_summaries.verdict: A pack of five individual waxes, each with its own unique aroma.
pros: We love the scented options that add some fun to the waxing process
Some customers note waxes can last for several years
A cost-effective gift for the avid skier and/or snowboarder
cons: None perform particularly well in extremely cold temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty killer unboxing all these wax products for the small price! So far I've tried the black gold and white lightning. Black Gold is super slippery and fast, I love it! The White Lightning is pretty good, I use it for my friends board and save the black one for myself haha!!
customer_reviews.author: Nate D.

customer_reviews.title: Omg these smell good. First time waxing (and beginner snowboarder) though
customer_reviews.text: Omg these smell good. First time waxing (and beginner snowboarder) though, so maybe that's the norm? Anyway, I used the orange warm wax on used boards, and definitely felt some speed on the board. Will buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Al Dente

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Wax is decent definitely not the best if you ride all the time definitely get something better but if you rarely wax then this would be fine
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price, and the wax is great on the
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, everything listed was there. Awesome price, and the wax is great on the snow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ready to send 🤙🏼
customer_reviews.text: Rubbed all season and then melted cold temp over the top of my Assassin Pro. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Be ready for anything!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wax assortment. Each block will do quite a few waxes...I use these on my board as well as my skis.
customer_reviews.author: Brenterino

customer_reviews.title: Good wax for very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Good wax for very cheap. The smells aren't really my thing but for the price I'll put up with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan P Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas present for my father. Love that you get five different types of wax at an affordable price. Excited for him to try the warm weather wax as he snowbirds a lot in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Cara McDavitt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wax!!! The green is the best in my opinion but all work great
customer_reviews.author: Sean B.

customer_reviews.title: The wax is good quality for you average rider
customer_reviews.text: The pack comes with so much wax. The wax is good quality for you average rider. The kit has a wax for every condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tarik

customer_reviews.title: which works pretty well in all temperatures
customer_reviews.text: I Have tried the Black Gold, which works pretty well in all temperatures. However, I have been looking for a good cold wax. I tried the Blue Blur on a cold stormy day with 16" of fresh powder and it was terrible. I stuck really bad and it made it nearly impossible to ride the flats. My friend who I waxed with just an all-temp did better on the flats then me. I don't recommend using the Blue Blur unless its a cold groomer day, even then its not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: jrad87

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: 30 is way to much get it for 8 bucks off there website
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DEMON UNITED All Season Ski & Snowboard Speed Wax Kit, 133 Grams of Each Temperature of Snowboard Wax, 1.4 Lbs of Total Ski Wax, DMNWXPK
product_meta.description: Be prepared for the entire season with the Demon United all season speed wax Kit. Includes one of: blue blur cold Temp wax (below 31 degrees orange crush warm Temp wax (above 31 degrees) white Lightning universal Temp wax modified hydro carbon universal Temp wax Black gold GRAPHITE universal Temp wax for use with a wax iron.
feature_bullets: Includes warm wax, cold wax, Lightning universal Temp wax, Modified hydro carbon universal wax and black gold graphite universal wax.
